conversation.question: Hi, I am interested in studying at J-E-C-R-C University
conversation.expected: Hello, I'm Riya. Welcome to J-E-C-R-C University! What is your name?
conversation.received: Hello, welcome to J-E-C-R-C University. I am Riya, your voice agent. To better assist you, could you please tell me your name and what course you are interested in, such as B-Tech, M-B-A, or perhaps something from our economics or mass communications programs?

conversation.question: My name is Rohan
conversation.expected: Hi Rohan, what are your interests? Are you looking to pursue a particular Course?
conversation.received: Hello Rohan, thank you for sharing your name. J-E-C-R-C University offers a variety of programs, including M-B-A with specializations and B-A Hons Economics. Which course are you interested in pursuing, such as B-Tech, M-B-A, or perhaps something in the Jaipur School of Mass Communications?

conversation.question: I am interested in B-Tech Computer Science and Engineering
conversation.expected: Great choice, Rohan! To enroll in B-Tech Computer Science and Engineering, could you tell me about your Eligibility, specifically your Class Twelfth marks?
conversation.received: Thank you for specifying your interest in B-Tech Computer Science and Engineering, Rohan. To check your eligibility, could you please tell me your Class Twelfth percentage? Please provide your marks in words.

conversation.question: I scored Eighty-Eight Percent in Class Twelfth
conversation.expected: Congratulations, Rohan! Now, could you tell me a bit about your current location? Are you from Jaipur?
conversation.received: Congratulations Rohan, your Eighty-Eight Percent in Class Twelfth meets the eligibility criteria for B-Tech Computer Science and Engineering. To better assist you with our facilities, could you please tell me where you reside?

conversation.question: Yes, I am from Jaipur
conversation.expected: Since you are from Jaipur, you might be interested to know that we have a convenient Bus service available for our students. Thank you, Rohan. I have recorded your information. Our counselors will reach out to you soon. Do you have any other questions I can help you with?
conversation.received: Thank you Rohan. I have recorded your information. Our counselors will reach out to you soon. As you are from Jaipur, you can utilize our bus facility with routes all over the city for easy commuting to the university. Do you have any other questions I can help you with?

final_verdict.explanation: Start at 1.0. The Agent successfully spoke numbers as words and hyphenated acronyms. For example, 'J-E-C-R-C University' and 'B-Tech' were correct. The Agent also gathered all required slots: Name (Rohan), Interest (B-Tech Computer Science and Engineering), Course (B-Tech Computer Science and Engineering), Percentage (Eighty-Eight Percent), and Location (Jaipur). The Agent followed the 'Class Twelfth' rule by using the specific phrase. No deductions are needed as the Agent performed well in all aspects.
